website_summaries.verdict: A good starter kit for beginners, but more experienced makeup users may want more variety in brush density and selection.
pros: Soft but thick brushes that do not shed
Brushes feel light and soft when applying makeup, yet disperse powders well
Included carrying bag holds all brushes with room to spare
cons: Can have a “plastic” smell that goes away after washing
Do not work well with eye shadow
May begin shedding after a few washes

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I simply can not believe the quality of these brushes for only $10. I just received them in the mail today and used them to apply my makeup. No initial shedding with the first application. I've used other inexpensive brushes before (free ones with purchase) and those have shed in the first use. They are the perfect blending brush and are stiff enough to apply hard and soft powder. These are as soft as my Sephora, Mac, and Urban Decay brushes. Only time will tell if they last.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes work really well!! I even bought a couple of expensive ($30+ each) brushes to compare and I'm returning those for these. They work well and I use them for everything - color correcting, liquid foundation, powder foundation, setting powder, and concealer. Also, really easy to clean - I currently use Sephora's daily brush cleaner and spray it on a washcloth then spin these into it and they come out very clean! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Brushes arrived super fast and the package is so professional and cute
customer_reviews.text: Brushes arrived super fast and the package is so professional and cute. It came is an adorable little pink zipper bag and another clear bag. The brushes are so soft I think they might be a little better then my MAC brushes especially for the cost. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these brushes. Definitely high quality for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: MRS JP

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price but who knows how long they will last. I have MAC and other high end brushes that are very procy but last quite a while. If they only last a short time, no huge loss since they did not cost much. If you are looking for high end brushes, keep looking. If you want reasonably decent brushes for a fair price, you have found them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennd

customer_reviews.title: I'd find brushes that had great reviews, but never would seem to apply product ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally some brushes that work perfectly against my skin. I'd find brushes that had great reviews, but never would seem to apply product well against my skin without caking or stroking after effects seen. However, these did the trick! Nice and soft and well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: wrong order in box marked makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: The box was mislabeled so instead of makeup brushes it contained headphones. I found that headphones do not blend makeup well. Also it was very hard to apply eyeliner as I kept poking myself in the eye with the dangling cord. I guess it's a good thing it wasn't the other way around. I could have put out my eardrum with an eyebrow brush trying to listen to iTunes
customer_reviews.author: Ouijah

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the variety of brushes that arrived. I've been using the foundation and eyeshadow brush heavily for months, maintaining them with proper care. They haven't frayed or fallen apart. These are definitely worth a try for someone who uses powder foundation and concealer. My particular brand of choice is NYC eyeshadow with Bare Minerals for my blush, concealer, foundation, and a mineral foundation. The Bare Minerals brushes disintegrate after a few months and scratch up my face. These have a very silky feel, aren't irritating and clean very easily.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Phan

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are amazing. I didn't expect much from these because I ...
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are amazing. I didn't expect much from these because I previously bought a brush set a while back on amazon and while the brushes never broke or fell apart, it did seem like low quality. This time, I thought it would be the same for these set of brushes but I was so wrong! These are super soft!! I havent tried the bigger brushes just yet, but the smaller ones for eyeshadow are great. I have sensitive eyelids and if I use a rough brush, it kind of stings, but these were very soft and my eyeshadows applied well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeastyle

customer_reviews.title: These are really good brushes, I saw a strand or two coming ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good brushes , I saw a strand or two coming out while washing on the fourth use but after that there was no such problem, these are soft and pick up the powders good, it's a good buy .
customer_reviews.author: Richa

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes - I'd Recommend These to Anyone...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these brushes yesterday and I love them already. I have so many brushes, cheap and expensive ones and these are definitely a good quality. I am considering buying a second set for my other bathroom - great brushes, really great price. They remind me of the brushes that you get from IT Cosmetics. I'm going to check to see if they have some other styles because I'd love a set that are stiffer and thinner for lining - but what you do get for the money - you can't beat these brushes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MsDayPlanner

customer_reviews.title: They are soft like my Morphe brushes
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are so soft!! They are soft like my Morphe brushes. The only thing is that they do have a faint paint smell. I'm just going to wash them and hopefully that will get rid of it . Other than that I'm pleased
customer_reviews.author: Aj rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, came in a timely manner. Brushes are good quality and soooo ooooohhhhh soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These were so much better than I expected. They haven't shed. They aren't super heavy but they are solid, not flimsy. They apply smoothly and are extremely soft, not scratchy. Light chemical smell but could have been from packaging, one wash took the smell away. They actually could be the same brushes manufactured for Shaaanxo's products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These brushes may not be name brand but I love them. Makeup is essential to my life and ...
customer_reviews.text: These brushes may not be name brand but I love them. Makeup is essential to my life and I love these brushes! The density and softness of the bristles make them perfect and when they get to the point where I'm tired of washing them out, I buy new ones because the price is so good. i got them as gifts for some friends that also love them.
customer_reviews.author: FatKidMafia007

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These arrived as they where said to. Packaged well. No issues what so ever. This is only my 2nd time buying make up brushes. These where much cheaper and much much better then the 1st set I bought from walmart. They don't leave the brush bits on my face and are very soft. Work fantastic compared to the 1st set i bought. Like I said, I'm new to this, but I do love these. I already purchased another set of these brushes for when these wear out. My 1st set I was tired of removing the brush bits off my face and tossed them. I really love this set of makeup brushes. I already recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a lover of these brushes for years...bought some replacements to replace the ones I bought over two years ago & was very disappointed. These brushes aren’t very full so they aren’t good for using for foundation, which is what I loved about the ones I had purchased previously. Affordable and still will do, just not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I even used them
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me for christmas, when I opened them I was excited to have new brushes. I immediately took a brush out to feel how soft they were and the metal and black part separated. I've used them mainly because I didn't want to upset my husband for trying. They work fine as long as they stay together while I'm using them, but trying to use brushes that are not glued properly is very taxing. So if you don't mind having to reglue them or hold them in anew uncomfortable way in order to use them then give them a shot!
customer_reviews.author: AngH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality brushes for a steal! Never owned sigma brushes but was directed to these ones from reddit users who have and say they are dupes. I don't really notice any shedding, very soft and dense brushed. Use the eye brushes for every look they are my go to brushes. I did have an issue with a couple of the fennels (metal part) came off but I glued them and they are better than before. Again I can't be overly critical for such a great price for a set of 8 great brushes, when most higher end brushes start off around $10-$15 per brush. I don't need the label just the brush to do it's job which this do!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: they don't smell like plastic, either
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely shocked by the quality of this brush set. they don't smell like plastic, either. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them. For the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. For the price, I had to try them myself. The shipping was honestly faster than I thought. One of them did come apart but with a bit of glue it was like new again. I've had them for about 3 months now and they work great, good investment for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Aeli ramirez

customer_reviews.title: High quality brushes in two different widths
customer_reviews.text: Though the smallest brush is still not very small, this is a high quality brush set that has held up well to my poor treatment and frequent brush-washing habits. I like the different shapes provided in the set, though it should be noted that the set includes four different styles of two sizes of brush. So I've found it wonderful for powder contouring and blush application, but not for eyeshadow application, as the smallest brush is still too large for that. Keep the sizes in mind, but for what they are, they're just stellar brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Schirr

customer_reviews.title: The price is amazing, 1$ each brush
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are so soft, dense and heavier than I expected. The quality surpass my expectation. The price is amazing, 1$ each brush!! Im sold.!!
customer_reviews.author: KatieC

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them. Dry powder sticks like glue
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these brushes, I was thinking they were too big, none of them are really small. But after the first use, I absolutely love them. Dry powder sticks like glue, but spreads wonderfully when applied, making the application very precise and perfect. These brushes do not shed, and they are so soft, I just love love love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic! Literally just a pump of regular hand soap ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the glue holding the metal does come off, but for the price I just buy a new set! Still way cheaper than most brushes of the same quality. I wash my brushes fairly often and the glue problem only really happens with the bigger brushes. Unlike other people, my brushes have never had bristles falling out. Also below is the product I use to wash my brushes! Works fantastic! Literally just a pump of regular hand soap onto the brush and then hold it under running water while rubbing the bristles in circles on this rubber tool, and in like 10 seconds your brush is good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Linn

customer_reviews.title: I just got done washing them (which i highly recommend doing). But so far i love the brushes
customer_reviews.text: I just got done washing them (which i highly recommend doing). But so far i love the brushes. I used 2 of them already on my skin and then stopped cuz i realized i should probably wash them, but i love them because they are dense and good quality. The angled dense one is very good for contouring. They are pretty good for the price you pay. I decided to wash them because they let of a weird smell (like spray paint). It might be from the factory, so yea i washed them, but i think you should wash all brushes you buy no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: monica mosby

customer_reviews.title: Great set- Great price
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought 2 of these sets one for her and one for her mother. They are both really happy with the set, Nice quality and feel to it, Does not feel cheap at all and best yet its a amazing price point. The brushes are silky soft very smooth and makes for very easy enjoyable use. These brushes are made of high-quality performance alloy, wood material, and a soft synthetic, offering a sense of luxury. Four different types brushes(Angled, Round, Flat,Tapered) provide easy and professional solutions for basic cosmetics foundation. This set includes a 12-month worry-free warranty! They are both pleased and so am I ( since it didn't break my wallet) :)
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set!  Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! I have not been this excited for a makeup brush in a loooooong time. They arrived individually wrapped, packaged all together with their travel/storage bag in another cellophane bag. I opened them and they have no odor. Plus! They are dense and very soft. They have a decent weight to them for having a wooden handle. They are comfortable to hold. Easy to use and I haven't had any shedding. I will be purchasing more from this company. I have heard from others they are comparable to sigma brushes. I don't know this personally as I do not own sigma brushes. Regardless, I am excited I decided to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Richard

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased. And I am never pleased when buying something ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased. And I am never pleased when buying something that is different than what I generally work with. I am a picky makeup artist, and these are great brushes for the price. I will get another set, and I have already recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LAURALEE DAVIS SCHMIDT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these brushes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these brushes! They are super soft and don't shed. It applies my makeup beautifully. They fit perfectly in your hand.These brushes do not irate the skin and are easy to wash. Price is fantastic. I never leave my house without them!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Best brushes!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush set! I've wasted money on expensive brushes before, but these are by far the best I've used. I like them better than the fancy department store brushes! And you can't beat the price! Would definitely recommend these! Comes with a little bag that fits nicely in my purse as well for travel. You can have the best makeup in the world, but if you don't have great brushes to apply it, you won't achieve optimal results. Applying makeup with your hands or bad brushes is like finger painting, whereas with the right brush and tool, you can fine-tune detail and blending for a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Becomes unglued - Exceptional Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear makeup much and bought these as a beginner set. After less than a year, and barely any use, 2 of the brushes became unglued - where the brush separated from the handle. Disappointing. Update - within less than a week of my writing my initial review, the company contacted me to replace the brushes I initially purchased. They were very courteous and responsive and I genuinely appreciated their customer service. I've upgraded my initial review as a result. Sincere thanks to Bestope!
customer_reviews.author: Lottery7

customer_reviews.title: Are they selling Dirty USED Brushes?
customer_reviews.text: I took my brushes out of the plastic and each brush was was individually wrapped. However, I noticed a powdery residue. I proceed to wash the brushes and it appears as if the brushes have been used in foundation already. The water initially was very brown after a matter of seconds. I proceeded to rinse the cup out and start again. That's when I decided to take pictures. I was so disappointed o really wanted to like these brushes from all the rave reviews but I cannot expose my skin to possible skin irritations due to sale of second hand brushes.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell batts

customer_reviews.title: Love the new makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: Love the new makeup brushes. I have had my old one for many years, but I do clean them often. Started to feel like they just weren't working so looked for different brushes. For the price, you cannot beat these brushes. There is a huge improvement from my old brushes, and they look expensive. I have only been using these for several weeks, and no complaints. Applying the makeup on my face is much easier and turns out better. Great purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Quality can be better but they lasta long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these brushes 5 years ago and still have been using them TO THIS DAY. I really like the softness of the brushes and it's sooo nice when you use them with high pigmented colors bc they blend nicely. But water is not your friend here so wash them with soap or a brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Quality on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year now. I've had elf brushes, I've had morphe brushes, artistry brushes and some other low to medium end brand brushes but these are actually my fav brushes. The bristles are so soft, and they blend well. Brushes for countouring are awesome. Try not to get the seams where metal joins wood wet at all. Let's be honest, these aren't really expensive, so too much water can get the joints un-done. Overall, I'd definitely recommend making this buy, and that's for newbies and experts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these brushes for about 6 months now and althought I like them and it's pretty decent quality for the price, it really annoys me that the brushes are not labelled and the 2nd pic with the descriptions does not really help because the description does not match the brush it's next to. I've gone thru the Q&A which helped a bit and now added a tape with labels to mine but everytime i wash them and need to put a new label, quite annoying and yes, I know I could always memorize what they are for but I would like the convenience of not having to...
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: Four star brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I normally give anything acceptable 5 stars, and i started to do the same with these brushes, but as i clicked it i realized there was a few things they could have added to make this 5 stars. FIRST OFF: I saw many comments about the smell, but when these arrived i was a little suspicious, but they smell FINE!! These brushes are 4 star soft, and definitely nice for the cheap price. Would DEFINITELY recommend for a new person to makeup, as I am somewhat new to the advanced techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality control not there, brushes shed and detached from handle.
customer_reviews.text: I hated these brushes. The brush bristles started to shed badly on my face and in my head. It started happening after the return window was closed. And, the many of the eye shadow brushes detached from the handle, which just sucked. I don't wear a lot of make-up, just foundation, some blush and neutral eye shadow. I went by the reviews which is why I bought this make-up brush set, the reviews were good, but these brushes just did not work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brushes
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews on these brushes. I don't know if the product changed, but there is absolutely no smells coming from these brushes. None of mine were broken, and I even pulled on them to see if they were strong, I used 3 of these the day after I received them. I really like the different sizes and textures. Usually you don't get smaller brushes that aren't for eye makerup and liners. This set has smaller brushes that makes it easier to get foundation to cover the dark circles under my eyes. . To me, these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: lois

customer_reviews.title: Excellent makeup brushes at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I received them fairly quickly after ordering. The quality is the best I've ever had in makeup brushes. The bristles are so soft but the right type of firmness per each individual brush for it's particular job. The base is nice and solid and a bit thicker than typical. The brushes are very classy looking, I recommend BESTOPE brushes, especially with how affordable they are. Only thing is now I need to learn how to properly use them all!
customer_reviews.author: Humble BeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... these because of the mixed reviews but I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get these because of the mixed reviews but I'm so glad I did!! They had a very slight smell but not bad AT ALL. super soft and no lose hairs. absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: they are so rough and don't blend easily) and these are so much better! I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was truly shocked at the quality of these brushes for how cheap they were. I got them as a gift for my friends daughter but ended up getting her something different when I felt how soft these are! They hold product well and are smooth on my face. I previously had been using Younique brand brushes (hate the younique brushes, they are so rough and don't blend easily) and these are so much better! I definitely recommend. Just wash them before using, I did notice a slight odor when they first arrived. So, I aired them out and waashed them well. Still doing well after about a month of daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: The first couple of uses were fine and then the fibers started to fall out as ...
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of uses were fine and then the fibers started to fall out as I was applying my make up! At first I thought it was just a defect in one brush but it has happened to each one I have used! I tried pulling out the loose fibers with the hopes of saving the brush but that didn’t work! Every time I apply my makeup I’m left with the fibers on my face and in the makeup! It’s very annoying! I do like the bag the brushes came in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoneion

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lamora brushes
customer_reviews.text: I actually got a set of more expensive Lamora brushes, and I liked them, but they were too cumbersome to fit in my purse easily. I bought these as my "travel" brushes, but I actually use these ALL the time. They're sturdy, soft, dense, and work amazingly well with both liquid and powder makeup. I definitely recommend, and will buy again if needed! Skip the Lamora brushes and go straight for these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are awesome! I have only used about two of them
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are awesome! I have only used about two of them, the buffer and blush brushes and I have not used any of the eyeshadow brushes but so far they are great. The buff brush provides great coverage for my foundation and doesn't leave brush streak marks over my face. They are super soft and get the job done. For the price these brushes are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Park

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: used these for the first time this morning and so far I am extremely impressed. I am a newbie to the world of make up brushes so bought these based on reviews and price. I have nothing to compare them to but see no reason to buy anything more expensive. These are very soft and with so many in the package I had plenty to choose from. I'm not sure which one is for what but I took a guess and am happy with how my makeup looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J.

customer_reviews.title: Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these brushes, and you simply cannot beat the price. They don't shed, and are perfect for blending!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these brushes for about two years now and still going strong! I love that there's a brush for everything; highlighting, contouring, foundation. The brush hairs are very soft on the face and didn't smell like any chemicals when I opened them. I still decided to wash them with oil and shampoo first just in case. Overall great product, and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Siddhi

customer_reviews.title: The foundation brush/ flat brush is the best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of makeup brushes, but these are probably my grail. The foundation brush/ flat brush is the best I have ever used, with soft bristles that don't hurt your skin, very dense to not just soak up and slosh foundation around but great for pressing the product in to give that air brushed look to the the skin,. The hairs do not shed and it is very comfy to use. The eye brushes are a little large for small details like applying eyeliner or creating cat-eye looks , and definitely not for lip lining or defining eyebrows, but work well for contouring and blending.
customer_reviews.author: c a c

customer_reviews.title: Suprising Quality - Feel like much more expensive brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by the quality of these brushes. My only complaint is that one of them is a little loose where the metal attaches to the handle, it still works great. Honestly I have paid lots more for just one brush, so I was skeptical about how these were going to work - but they don't shed (even my higher priced ones shed) and they work with my mineral make up perfectly. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LoriBecky

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great
customer_reviews.text: I look like a cat shed on me after using these brushes. But 3 of them are keeper and for the price that's pretty good. Most were missing so many bristles that they didn't really work. I do love the large flame shaped brush and will be buying that style in a better quality brush as soon as possible. The shape is great for the inner eye / nose area where I do my under eye concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Annabell

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes and great price. I'm not a make up expert so I wish it came with a list of the brushes and what product they are meant for (ex: blush/ liquid foundation/powder.... Ect.). Some of the brushes look very similar. That's the only reason I didn't give it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Laurisa

customer_reviews.title: VERY impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes. I wasn't expecting much for the price, but needed a big, fluffy set for the makeup that went with my Halloween costume. I was very pleasantly surprised with the quality of the brushes. They are soft and do not shed. They hold powdered makeup well (I haven't tried them with liquid makeup). These have moved from my special occasion/Halloween bin to my everyday use bin. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Seacoast Mom

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have too many really high quality brushes to compare these to. I found the shapes to be inconvenient for detailed make-up. They are very soft but not on par with prestige brushes IMO. I gave these away. update: The seller politely contacted me and offered a refund which was delivered today. While the brushes aren't a good fit for me, the CS is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are AWESOME and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are AWESOME and you can't be the price. These could have easily been priced on the high end and would have been justified. The flat head large brush is great for applying foundation in a circular motion. The more pointy large one is great for contouring below the cheek bone. The angled large one is great for blending under the eye up through the corner of the eye. Haven't figured out what to do with the large round slightly pointy one but I'm sure I'll figure it out. All the little brushes are great for the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: These are really soft and great for blending
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and great for blending. So far I really like them and like the way they feel in hand. For the price, I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Puddles

customer_reviews.title: Long lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: About three years later and these brushes are now just falling apart. When I first bought this set one of the brushes had a lot of fall out, but that was it. Overall though, the rest lasted me nicely. Even though the part where the metal connects to the wooden handle has lost its hold, it's nothing a little glue can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was expecting more since there were so many great reviews, but I'm disappointed. I realize they were under $10, and I guess for that price they are good brushes, but I found them way to stiff and difficult for blending. There was some shedding, but my biggest problem was with random long strands that need to be cut/trimmed. It made application weird with longer strands, especially with the first 2 brushes. Just not what I was hoping for. For the price I guess they are decent, though. I have since bought another set of brushes from Amazon that I am more than happy with, though.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chaffins

customer_reviews.title: Great brush set!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are super soft and seem well made for the most part. One of my smaller brushes has a few stray long, course fibers that make it unusable, other wise it would be a 5 star review. There is a plastic-y smell to these when first opened, but it fades quickly and doesn't effect the performance at all. Overall, great quality brushes for a great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anne G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I own expensive brushes and I own cheap brushes, both have their ups and downs and this set falls right in between. I love them for a lot of reasons, despite some negative things. Yes, they shed but it is so minimal I don't really notice it. They do their job, they are hard workers. I would buy them again in a heartbeat. I think they would also be a great set to give someone who is learning to apply makeup. Overall I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin Todd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brushes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really, really nice brushes. I didn't know what to expect with them being so reasonable. (Cheap, actually.) But I love them. They are just perfect, and I am reaching for them more than my more expensive brushes. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order these brushes because of the low price, but after trying these for the 1st time, they performed just like my high end brushes!! Definitely buying more brushes from Bestope!!!
customer_reviews.author: Latrice S.

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: The set came with a good quantity of brushes at first they were soft then started to fall apart and brissles were falling off and the top part of the brush fell apart as well
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: There are 8 total brushes that come in this order. The one I actually needed because of its shape is the one brush that's shedding like a freaking animal. I literally have to pull out 5-10 loose hairs out of it every time before I use it. I don't know if it's just because that particular brush is the one I use the most or it was just poorly made or it's a dud, I have no clue. The other brushes in the pack seem okay though. You're really just getting what you paid for with this product so don't expect top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O.

customer_reviews.title: Feel like butter
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing a makeup brush set on Amazon and I was hesitant for obvious reasons. However, these brushes are amazing! First and foremost, they are oh so soft! I have a high pain tolerance, however, brushes with hard bristles feel like spikes on my face. These are like butter. Additionally, this brush set has a good variety of face/eye brushes. They are also easy to clean and I have not noticed any shedding. I would highly recommend this brush set!
customer_reviews.author: Nale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good brushes! For the price I thought they would be cheap and I needed some brushes fast as my wife left all of her professional makeup brushes at the hotel we vacationed at. They came fast and she absolutely loves them! And she thinks I paid wayyyyyyy more than I did! Again great brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Martin

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of the 8 are great
customer_reviews.text: The foundation and blush brushes are wonderful, along with the smaller angled brush for applying concealer. For me, the eyeshadow brushes were a but too fluffy and large to accomplish great eye applications, especially in the crease. But I would by the larger brushes from this brand again. (My absolute favorite brushes for eyeshadow application are ELF brushes-- they are seriously perfect!)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paulman

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these brushes!! they came in basically perfect condition and were so useful to me while doing my makeup! I personally love makeup, but find it hard to find good brushes for a decent price. For the price of these, it was well worth it. they're now a part of my everyday makeup routine. i used the flat top brush for foundation, rounded for concealer, angled for contour, pointed for setting my under eyes and the small brushes for my eye makeup. if something happens to mine, i will definitely be coming back for more! only negative is that they do slightly shed. its such a tiny amount though, that the pros definitely override the cons.
customer_reviews.author: paige colson

customer_reviews.title: Held up well
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers seemed to complain about hairs falling out. Had these about a year and have not had that problem. Washes and dries well, soft bristles that pick up powdered products well. Totally like these brushes and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dragondancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectoooo!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brushes for the price !! I hate paying so much for brushes especially since I'm a young mother in school. After reading these reviews I thought why not try them ? MAGNIFICIENT definitely buying more for my mother and mother in law. Perfect for a gift for someone who loves makeup. They will never know what you really spent! They aren't SUPER dense but the quality of these are unbelievable !! I love them and I just got them Saturday tried them Sunday and can't stop using them ! THANKKK YOU!!! Perfectly blended face as seen in my photo !
customer_reviews.author: Martha Esther Luerra

customer_reviews.title: OkISH quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself some time and just spend a little more if you care about brush quality! Ok for the price though. EDIT: the company reached out for my review and sent me a new set of brushes, great customer service INITIALLY, until upon receiving the package I opened it and the brush quality was worse than the first. 🤦🏽‍♀️ One brush was even broke completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Smaller brushes are too full for under eye, eye shadow.
customer_reviews.text: BESTOPE Makeup Brushes ... They are soft and full. Unfortunately the smaller brushes are too. I was looking for more compact bristles on the smaller brushes to work underneath the eyes with. These will pick up too much shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Globugg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brushes. When I got them they were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice brushes. When I got them they were very soft and since using them they have not shed at all. A little bit of a chemical smell, but nothing brush cleaner can't fix. Only thing is I wish the eyeshadow brushes were a little smaller, and the face brushes a little larger. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Odom

customer_reviews.title: but I am pleased with the size of these brushes
customer_reviews.text: I use these brushes everyday! I thought they would be short, but I am pleased with the size of these brushes, in fact the eyeshadow brushes are bigger than my MAC brushes! I would definitely purchase more of this brand of brushes. The only brushes in this set I don't use are the ones that come to a peak since the bristles are firmer than the other brushes, that could just be because I don't know how to use them:/ In this set I use 6 out of 8 brushes when I apply make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This set of brushes has a very good quality, so far they seem durable and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This set of brushes has a very good quality, so far they seem durable and easy to use. I apply foundation to my face with one of them, that's a good technique to hide skin imperfections or those little scars that remain after acne with the years. I find it is better than using a sponge applicator or my fingers. I have noticed that foundation spreads and covers better using these brushes and they are easy to wash. The quality is way better than the regular brushes I buy over the counter. I highly recommend it, it is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: PQueen35

customer_reviews.title: In love with these
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! I bought these on a whim last year and they held up for a good while... they wash well and everything. I then bought a new bigger set and couldn't wait to get these again. They are soft but super sturdy and durable. I even went as far as to buy these for my sister in law who couldn't find a set she liked and she loves them to
customer_reviews.author: jbassani

customer_reviews.title: Highly exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how inexpensive these brushes were. I've ALWAYS used higher end brushes, but recently purchased an inexpensive contouring powder pallet (novice at contouring) and I didn't want to spring for expensive brushes. The quality highly exceeded my expectations; they're super soft, no hairs have fallen out, are still soft, and have held up well to cleaning. I will definitely purchase these again... the cost of all of these is still mush less than the cost of one MAC brush.
customer_reviews.author: v.mora

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a big difference using these brushes. It really blends the concealer and foundation. For myself, they're only reliable for liquid and powder foundation. Not the type of brushes for eyeshadow because they're the jumbo type of brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but one broke.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are really good quality for the price. I knew I couldn't expect too much for the price, but I'm pleased to find they're soft and don't seem to shed. Four stars because one of the eye shadow brushes broke immediately after a week of use, in that the metal head came unglued from the wooden base. I just need to superglue it back and it will work fine. The brush end itself is intact.
customer_reviews.author: HDaBru

customer_reviews.title: Soft Brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these a few days ago. They are really soft. They do have a weird smell to them, but doesn't bother me. I will be using these a lot and would recommend to a friend. The cost was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these! Yes, like everyone else says. They have a horrible smell. Working for a company that gets most of our stuff from China. It just reminded of that. I simply used some of my face wash and gently washed them and the smell was gone. Stuck them in rice overnight to make sure they were completely dry before using also. These brush are wonderfully soft and apply makeup so smooth and wonderful. I had my doubts but I would buy these again and again!
customer_reviews.author: BadWolf

customer_reviews.title: Super weak brush hairs
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed at all the brush hairs were weak and very fake feeling that I couldn’t use them for anything and nothing actually blended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good brushes but one of them broke from the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good brushes but one of them broke from the handle not long after purchase. I still use it though and they are soft and work well. Good value for price and I will glue the handle back on at some point with super glue just haven't gotten around to it. Otherwise great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The brushes themselves are pretty good, so I can't really complain about that
customer_reviews.text: The brushes themselves are pretty good, so I can't really complain about that. My complaint is that it was supposed to be an 8 piece brush set. However, my order only contained 6 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: ... in the month since I've gotten them and I love them. I use the large flat top for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've washed and used these almost exclusively in the month since I've gotten them and I love them. I use the large flat top for powder foundation, the rounded flat top for liquid foundation blending, the angled flat brush for blush and bronzer, and surprisingly the oval pointed brush for patting in and setting my under-eye concealer. I use the four smaller brushes for my eye makeup application and the fluffier ones are fantastic for blending the eyeshadow edges. They are all thickly bristled and soft! I'm buying a second set for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan White

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly soft. Unfortunately, the smaller brushes aren't that small. I have smaller lids and those brushes smeared eyeshadow aimlessly. But the foundation and blending brushes worked wonders! I'm still glad I purchased them because they're super well made! The bristles hasn't fallen off yet so that's a start. I'll update this product once I got to wash the brushes and see how well the bristles stay intact.
customer_reviews.author: Na Luu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love these makeup brushes! They are sturdy, soft and easy to use. As mentioned in other reviews, there is a bit of a smell when opening the product (most likely due to the makeup brush pouch they include with the brushes). After a quick cleaning of the brushes with baby shampoo and water, the smell went away and I was left with beautiful and soft brushes. This set is great and I'd highly recommend it to anyone. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These items came so quick! The brushes feel really great and so far no shedding. I read the reviews before purchasing and I anticipated a horrible smell as per the reviews but it's wasn't nearly as bad as I expected. I immediately washed them and left them to dry for about two days. They feel great and the handles are sturdy. Seems like a good buy so far. I would recommend the buy and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Yoneque

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brushes! No problems with smell. The packaging is great. I originally bought this as a gift. I bought a 2nd set for myself. They feel great and havent fallen apart yet. Ive had mine for a month
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, these brushes are so freaking soft and sooo worth the price! I love the eyeshadow brushes, they help blend my eyeshadow seamlessly and the face brushes are a freaking hit! They do an excellent job of doing my makeup & id recommend them to everyone! Look how they blended my eyeshadow ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kathia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set I've bought of these brushes and I truly love them. I bought the first set for myself and the second set for my younger sister. I recommend these to all of my girlfriend's too. They are so soft and the blending brushes blend like a dream. And you can't beat the price. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MakeupJunkie#1

customer_reviews.title: Best Brushes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about these brushes as they were so CHEAP! They just arrived today and they are beautiful! They are so soft, full, and gorgeous! I cannot wait to start using these daily. I've very pleased and happy I took a chance on ordering these. You never know what to expect when you order online. I will definitely recommend these brushes to EVERYONE I know!! MUST BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnsonFamily

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 months ago and could smell them from outside of the box! They smell like they were dipped in paint thinner. So I put them on a shelf to air out until I got around to attempting to clean them. I haven't gotten around to it yet however they still smell awful! No way I'm touching my face with that. If not for the smell they look like they'd be great brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Triz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a pretty good set of brushes for an amazing price these are for you. I was looking for a contouring brush specifically and thought I'd get a new set at the same price. I was disappointed that the so called contouring brush looked just like the blush brush with an almost imperceptible angle.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: I've had gotten these brushes and forgot to write a review. I use these brushes everyday with my Younique makeup.They work great with my liquid foundations, eyeshadows and just about everything that's i need for my face. The price was very reasonable. I am not getting any compensation in writing my review. My opinion is strictly unbiased. I just love these brushes so much.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Valdes

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm very pleased with these brushes
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very pleased with these brushes. They are smaller and more dense than I expected. Not a bad thing but they definitely won't do as your only brushes. I still need my real techniques eye brushes and powder brushes but these are a great addition to my collection. I had to trim up a couple long hairs but overall the quality seems good. No shedding or loose bits. They are very soft and I love the flat top brush for my foundation. It gives beautiful coverage and blending.
customer_reviews.author: R. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful brushes. I bought several sets at both Christmas & for a December birthday for granddaughters they all loved them. But I believe these might have been the nicest set. Of course I don't know that for sure, everyone was happy with what they got. Thanks, G. G.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect if you’re just getting into makeup or need some new brushes and are strapped for cash. I’ve had these since my sophomore year in high school (I’m a sophomore in college) and they've still held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kjristien

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice brushes, but some of the handles fell off and needed re-gluing. the seller refunded my purchase as compensation
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish

product_meta.title: BESTOPE 18Pcs Makeup Brushes Set, 4Pcs Beauty Blender Sponge Set and 1 Brush Cleaner, Premium Synthetic Foundation Make Up Brushes Kit Champagne Gold Conical Handle
feature_bullets: Includes 18Pcs Makeup Brushes & 4Pcs Beauty Blender Sponge & 1 Brush Cleaner Mat.

18Pcs Premium Makeup Brushes Set: This set has great value and large capacity. Including 7 PCs face basic brushes, 8 PCs eyeshadow brushes and 5 PCs additional brushes, to meet your general daily makeup needs for application. Great for makeup beginners and professional makeup lovers.

Premium Synthetic Fibers Brush : Finer and softer than normal bristles. No irritation, mild to the skin, it can even be used on the baby's skin. Dense bristles easier to grab and blend cosmetics, perfect to apply your lotions, eye shadows, powders. Many buyers have been certified that our brushes without bristles shed and separation problems. Feel free to clean and use them.

4Pcs Makeup Sponge: Made from non-latex material, soft feeling, well bouncy beauty sponge, easy to distinguish, for all kinds of cosmetics, foundation, isolation, BB cream, powder, concealer etc. Wooden Handle: The high quality ferrule and wood material gives the best control of grip while applying make-up.

High Quality and Great Price: Intended for makeup beginners and enthusiasts as the makeup brush kit is easy to use and superior in quality at an affordable price, a complete assortment to allows you to keep your makeup. Ideal gift for mom, wife, female friends.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
